overview: Hotel rooms are rarely the destination for pilgrimage.  In one hotel room, an iconic picture was taken - the portrait of Theodor Herzl, the most renowned zionist leader.  Filmmaker Matan Tal visits the room and explores how the connection between Herzl and the room, echos Herzlâ€™s own ideology. Which raises the question: Can people and places be connected forever?
title: The Herzl Room
